content: Certificate with same action type already exists

comment.text: "This translation key is used to display an error message when a certificate with the same action type already exists. It appears in forms or UI elements that allow users to create or edit certificates, such as the SSO form store."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Υπάρχει ήδη πιστοποιητικό με τον ίδιο τύπο ενέργειας' is a literal translation but doesn't flow naturally in Greek. 'Τύπο ενέργειας' (type of action) is somewhat awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like 'Υπάρχει ήδη πιστοποιητικό με τον ίδιο τύπο δράσης' or 'Υπάρχει ήδη πιστοποιητικό με παρόμοια δράση'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Sertifikāts ar tādu pašu darbības tipu jau pastāv' is a literal translation and could be improved for clarity and naturalness in Latvian. 'Darbības tipu' is a bit clunky. A more fluent option would be to use a phrase like 'ar tādu pašu darbību' or 'ar tādu pašu veidu'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sertifikāts ar tādu pašu darbību jau pastāv

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Já existe um certificado com o mesmo tipo de acção' is a literal translation and sounds slightly awkward in Portuguese. While technically correct, it doesn't flow naturally. A more idiomatic translation would be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Um certificado com o mesmo tipo de ação já existe.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation 'Es gibt bereits ein Zertifikat mit gleichem Aktionstyp' is German, not Romanian. It translates to 'There is already a certificate with the same action type' in English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: The translation should be in Romanian. A possible translation could be: 'Există deja un certificat cu același tip de acțiune' or 'Un certificat cu același tip de acțiune există deja'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'සමාන ක්‍රියාමාර්ග වර්ගයක සහතිකයක් දැනටමත් පවතී' while conveying the general idea, could be more accurately translated to emphasize the 'certificate' aspect. The phrase 'සමාන ක්‍රියාමාර්ග වර්ගයේ සහතිකයක්' could be improved to something like 'සමාන ක්‍රියාවලියකට අයත් සහතිකයක්'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සමාන ක්‍රියාවලියකට අයත් සහතිකයක් දැනටමත් පවතී

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While understandable, the sentence structure is slightly awkward in Sinhala. It lacks a more natural flow. A more fluent construction would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සමාන ක්‍රියාවලියකට අයත් සහතිකයක් දැනටමත් පවතී
